subject: Football
lead_paragraph: In a plan devised to penetrate China, a fertile untapped market, the N.F.L. is training Gao Wei, Ding Long and Shen Yalei to become the first Chinese to play in America’s most popular sports league.
snippet: In a plan devised to penetrate China, a fertile untapped market, the N.F.L. is training Gao Wei, Ding Long and Shen Yalei to become the first Chinese to play in America’s most popular sports league.
